00006  * framework for this C++ / openFrameWorks implementation.

00125         
00136         static vector<float> cmykToRGB(float c, float m, float y, float k, vector<float> rgb) 
00137         {
00138                 float _red   = (c+k);
00139                 float _blue  = (m+k);
00140                 float _green = (y+k);
00141                 rgb[0] = (1.0 < (_red)  ? 1.0 : (_red));
00142                 rgb[1] = (1.0 < (_blue) ? 1.0 : (_blue));
00143                 rgb[2] = (1.0 < (_green)? 1.0 : (_green));
00144                 return rgb;
00145         }
00146 
00157         static vector<float> cmykToBGR(float c, float m, float y, float k, vector<float> bgr)
00158         {
00159                 float _blue  = (m+k);
00160                 float _green = (y+k);
00161                 float _red   = (c+k);
00162                 bgr[0] = (1.0 < (_blue)  ? 1.0 : _blue);
00163                 bgr[1] = (1.0 < (_green) ? 1.0 : _green);
00164                 bgr[3] = (1.0 < (_red)   ? 1.0 : _red);
00165                 return bgr;
00166         }

00174         static vector<float> hexToRGB(const char* stringHex)
00175         {
00176                 char* pEnd;
00177                 int hexInt;
00178                 hexInt = (int) strtoul(stringHex, &pEnd, 16);
00179                 _tempVector[0] = ( (hexInt >> 16) &0xFF ) * INV8BIT;
00180                 _tempVector[1] = ( (hexInt >> 8)  &0xFF ) * INV8BIT;
00181                 _tempVector[2] = ( (hexInt     )  &0xFF ) * INV8BIT;
00182 
00183                 return _tempVector;
00184         }
00185 
00192         static vector<float> hexToBGR(const char* stringHex)
00193         {
00194                 char* pEnd;
00195                 int hexInt;
00196                 hexInt = (int) strtoul(stringHex, &pEnd, 16);
00197                 _tempVector[0] = ( (hexInt      )  &0xFF ) * INV8BIT;
00198                 _tempVector[1] = ( (hexInt >> 8 )  &0xFF ) * INV8BIT;
00199                 _tempVector[2] = ( (hexInt >> 16)  &0xFF ) * INV8BIT;
00200                 return _tempVector;     
00201         }

00210         static vector<float> hexToRGB(const char* hexString, vector<float> rgb)
00211         {
00212                 char * pEnd;
00213                 int hexInt;
00214                 hexInt = strtoul(hexString, &pEnd, 16);
00215 
00216                 rgb[0] = ( (hexInt >> 16) &0xFF ) * INV8BIT;
00217                 rgb[1] = ( (hexInt >> 8 ) &0xFF ) * INV8BIT;
00218                 rgb[2] = ( (hexInt      ) &0xFF ) * INV8BIT;
00219 
00220                 return rgb;
00221         }

00230         static vector<float> hexToBGR(const char* hexString, vector<float> bgr)
00231         {
00232                 char* pEnd;
00233                 int hexInt;
00234                 hexInt = (int) strtoul(hexString, &pEnd, 16);
00235                 bgr[0] = ( (hexInt      )  &0xFF ) * INV8BIT;
00236                 bgr[1] = ( (hexInt >> 8 )  &0xFF ) * INV8BIT;
00237                 bgr[2] = ( (hexInt >> 16)  &0xFF ) * INV8BIT;
00238                 return bgr;

00276         static vector<float> hsvToRGB(float h, float s, float v, vector<float> rgb)
00277         {
00278                 if (fabs(s - 0) < 0.0000001) {
00279                         rgb[0] = rgb[1] = rgb[2] = v;
00280                 } else {
00281                         h /= INV60DEGREES;
00282                         int i = (int) h;
00283                         float f = h - i;
00284                         float p = v * (1 - s);
00285                         float q = v * (1 - s * f);
00286                         float t = v * (1 - s * (1 - f));
00287                         if (i == 0) {
00288                                 rgb[0] = v;
00289                                 rgb[1] = t;
00290                                 rgb[2] = p;
00291                         } else if (i == 1) {
00292                                 rgb[0] = q;
00293                                 rgb[1] = v;
00294                                 rgb[2] = p;
00295                         } else if (i == 2) {
00296                                 rgb[0] = p;
00297                                 rgb[1] = v;
00298                                 rgb[2] = t;
00299                         } else if (i == 3) {
00300                                 rgb[0] = p;
00301                                 rgb[1] = q;
00302                                 rgb[2] = v;
00303                         } else if (i == 4) {
00304                                 rgb[0] = t;
00305                                 rgb[1] = p;
00306                                 rgb[2] = v;
00307                         } else {
00308                                 rgb[0] = v;
00309                                 rgb[1] = p;
00310                                 rgb[2] = q;
00311                         }
00312                 }
00313                 return rgb;
00314         }
00315 
00325         static vector<float> hsvToBGR(float h, float s, float v, vector<float> bgr)
00326         {
00327                 if (fabs(s - 0) < 0.0000001) {
00328                         bgr[0] = bgr[1] = bgr[2] = v;
00329                 } else {
00330                         h /= INV60DEGREES;
00331                         int i = (int) h;
00332                         float f = h - i;
00333                         float p = v * (1 - s);
00334                         float q = v * (1 - s * f);
00335                         float t = v * (1 - s * (1 - f));
00336                         if (i == 0) {
00337                                 bgr[0] = p;
00338                                 bgr[1] = t;
00339                                 bgr[2] = v;
00340                         } else if (i == 1) {
00341                                 bgr[0] = p;
00342                                 bgr[1] = v;
00343                                 bgr[2] = q;
00344                         } else if (i == 2) {
00345                                 bgr[0] = t;
00346                                 bgr[1] = v;
00347                                 bgr[2] = p;
00348                         } else if (i == 3) {
00349                                 bgr[0] = v;
00350                                 bgr[1] = q;
00351                                 bgr[2] = p;
00352                         } else if (i == 4) {
00353                                 bgr[0] = v;
00354                                 bgr[1] = p;
00355                                 bgr[2] = t;
00356                         } else {
00357                                 bgr[0] = q;
00358                                 bgr[1] = p;
00359                                 bgr[2] = v;
00360                         }
00361                 }
00362                 return bgr;
00363         }

00415         static vector<float> labToRGB(float l, float a, float b, vector<float> rgb)
00416         {
00417                 float y = (l + 16) / 116.0f;
00418                 float x = a / 500.0f + y;
00419                 float z = y - b / 200.0f;
00420                 rgb[0] = x;
00421                 rgb[1] = y;
00422                 rgb[2] = z;
00423                 for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00424                         float p = (float) pow(rgb[i], 3);
00425                         if (p > 0.008856) {
00426                                 rgb[i] = p;
00427                         } else {
00428                                 rgb[i] = (rgb[i] - 16 / 116.0f) / 7.787f;
00429                         }
00430                 }
00431 
00432                 // Observer = 2, Illuminant = D65
00433                 x = rgb[0] * 0.95047f;
00434                 y = rgb[1];
00435                 z = rgb[2] * 1.08883f;
00436 
00437                 rgb[0] = x * 3.2406f + y * -1.5372f + z * -0.4986f;
00438                 rgb[1] = x * -0.9689f + y * 1.8758f + z * 0.0415f;
00439                 rgb[2] = x * 0.0557f + y * -0.2040f + z * 1.0570f;
00440                 float tpow = 1 / 2.4; // converted this var to float from double
00441                 for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00442                         if (rgb[i] > 0.0031308) {
00443                                 rgb[i] = (float) (1.055 * pow(rgb[i], tpow) - 0.055);
00444                         } else {
00445                                 rgb[i] = 12.92f * rgb[i];
00446                         }
00447                 }
00448                 return rgb;
00449         }
00450         
00465         static vector<float> labToBGR(float l, float a, float b, vector<float> bgr)
00466         {
00467                 float y = (l + 16) / 116.0f;
00468                 float x = a / 500.0f + y;
00469                 float z = y - b / 200.0f;
00470                 bgr[0] = z;
00471                 bgr[1] = y;
00472                 bgr[2] = x;
00473                 for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00474                         float p = (float) pow(bgr[i], 3);
00475                         if (p > 0.008856) {
00476                                 bgr[i] = p;
00477                         } else {
00478                                 bgr[i] = (bgr[i] - 16 / 116.0f) / 7.787f;
00479                         }
00480                 }
00481 
00482                 // Observer = 2, Illuminant = D65
00483                 z = bgr[0] * 0.95047f;
00484                 y = bgr[1];
00485                 x = bgr[2] * 1.08883f;
00486 
00487                 bgr[0] = x * 0.0557f + y * -0.2040f + z * 1.0570f;
00488                 bgr[1] = x * -0.9689f + y * 1.8758f + z * 0.0415f;
00489                 bgr[2] = x * 3.2406f + y * -1.5372f + z * -0.4986f;
00490                 float tpow = 1 / 2.4; // converted this var to float from double
00491                 for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00492                         if (bgr[i] > 0.0031308) {
00493                                 bgr[i] = (float) (1.055 * pow(bgr[i], tpow) - 0.055);
00494                         } else {
00495                                 bgr[i] = 12.92f * bgr[i];
00496                         }
00497                 }
00498                 return bgr;
00499         }

00507         static OColor newARGB(int argb)
00508         {
00509                 return newRGBA(((argb >> 16) & 0xff) * INV8BIT, 
00510                                            ((argb >> 8)  & 0xff) * INV8BIT, 
00511                                             (argb        & 0xff) * INV8BIT, 
00512                                                 (argb >> 24)         * INV8BIT);
00513         }

00521         static OColor newBGRA(int bgra)
00522         {
00523                 return newBGRA(         (bgra        & 0xff) * INV8BIT, 
00524                                                         ((bgra >> 8)  & 0xff) * INV8BIT, 
00525                                                         ((bgra >> 16) & 0xff) * INV8BIT, 
00526                                                         (bgra >> 24) * INV8BIT);
00527         }

00553         static OColor newCMYKA(float c, float m, float y, float k, float a)
00554         {
00555                 OColor col;
00556                 col.setCMYK(c, m, y, k);
00557                 col.alpha = a < 0 ? 1 : (a > 1 ? 1 : a);
00558                 return col;
00559         }

00726         static vector<float> rgbToCMYK(float r, float g, float b, vector<float> cmyk)
00727         {
00728                 cmyk[0] = 1 - r;
00729                 cmyk[1] = 1 - g;
00730                 cmyk[2] = 1 - b;
00731                 cmyk[3] = (cmyk[0] < cmyk[1]) ? ((cmyk[0] < cmyk[2]) ? cmyk[0] : cmyk[2]) : ((cmyk[1] < cmyk[2]) ? cmyk[1] : cmyk[2]);
00732 
00733                 cmyk[0] = (cmyk[0] - cmyk[3]) < 0 ? 1 : ((cmyk[0] - cmyk[3]) > 1 ? 1 : (cmyk[0] - cmyk[3]));
00734                 cmyk[1] = (cmyk[1] - cmyk[3]) < 0 ? 1 : ((cmyk[1] - cmyk[3]) > 1 ? 1 : (cmyk[1] - cmyk[3]));
00735                 cmyk[2] = (cmyk[2] - cmyk[3]) < 0 ? 1 : ((cmyk[2] - cmyk[3]) > 1 ? 1 : (cmyk[2] - cmyk[3]));
00736                 cmyk[3] = cmyk[3] < 0 ? 1 : (cmyk[3] > 1 ? 1 : cmyk[3]);
00737                 return cmyk;
00738         }
00739 
00749         static vector<float> bgrToCMYK(float b, float g, float r, vector<float> cmyk)
00750         {
00751                 cmyk[0] = 1 - b;
00752                 cmyk[1] = 1 - g;
00753                 cmyk[2] = 1 - r;
00754                 cmyk[3] = (cmyk[0] < cmyk[1]) ? ((cmyk[0] < cmyk[2]) ? cmyk[0] : cmyk[2]) : ((cmyk[1] < cmyk[2]) ? cmyk[1] : cmyk[2]);
00755 
00756                 cmyk[3] = (cmyk[2] < cmyk[1]) ? ((cmyk[2] < cmyk[1]) ? cmyk[2] : cmyk[1]) : ((cmyk[1] < cmyk[1]) ? cmyk[1] : cmyk[1]);
00757                 cmyk[0] = (cmyk[0] - cmyk[3]) < 0 ? 1 : ((cmyk[0] - cmyk[3]) > 1 ? 1 : (cmyk[0] - cmyk[3]));
00758                 cmyk[1] = (cmyk[1] - cmyk[3]) < 0 ? 1 : ((cmyk[1] - cmyk[3]) > 1 ? 1 : (cmyk[1] - cmyk[3]));
00759                 cmyk[2] = (cmyk[2] - cmyk[3]) < 0 ? 1 : ((cmyk[2] - cmyk[3]) > 1 ? 1 : (cmyk[2] - cmyk[3]));
00760                 cmyk[3] = cmyk[3] < 0 ? 1 : (cmyk[3] > 1 ? 1 : cmyk[3]);
00761                 return cmyk;
00762         }

00772         static char* rgbToHex(float red, float green, float blue)
00773         {
00774                 char buffer[9] = "";
00775                 char hexString[8] = "";
00776 
00777                 char* sRed = "";
00778                 int iRed;
00779                 float fRed = red < 0 ? 1 : (red > 1 ? 1 : red);
00780                 iRed = (int) (fRed * 0xFF);
00781                 if (iRed == 0) {
00782                         strcat(buffer, "00");
00783                 } else {
00784                         sRed=itoa(iRed,hexString,16);
00785                         strcat(buffer, sRed);
00786                 }
00787 
00788                 char* sGreen = "";
00789                 int iGreen;
00790                 float fGreen = green < 0 ? 1 : (green > 1 ? 1 : green);
00791                 iGreen = (int) (fGreen * 0xFF);
00792                 if (iGreen == 0) {
00793                         strcat(buffer, "00");
00794                 } else {
00795                         sGreen = itoa(iGreen, hexString, 16);
00796                         strcat(buffer, sGreen);
00797                 }
00798 
00799                 char* sBlue = "";
00800                 int iBlue;
00801                 float fBlue = blue < 0 ? 1 : (blue > 1 ? 1 : blue);
00802                 iBlue = (int) (fBlue * 0xFF);
00803                 if (iBlue == 0) {
00804                         strcat(buffer, "00");
00805                 } else {
00806                         sBlue = itoa(iBlue, hexString, 16);
00807                         strcat(buffer, sBlue);
00808                 }
00809 
00810                 return buffer;
00811         }
00812         
00821         static const char* brgToHex(float blue, float green, float red)
00822         {

00824                 char hexString[8] = "";
00825 
00826                 char* sBlue = "";
00827                 int iBlue;
00828                 float fBlue = blue < 0 ? 1 : (blue > 1 ? 1 : blue);
00829                 iBlue = (int) (fBlue * 0xFF);
00830                 if (iBlue == 0) {
00831                         strcat(buffer, "00");
00832                 } else {
00833                         sBlue = itoa(iBlue, hexString, 16);
00834                         strcat(buffer, sBlue);
00835                 }
00836 
00837                 char* sGreen = "";
00838                 int iGreen;
00839                 float fGreen = green < 0 ? 1 : (green > 1 ? 1 : green);
00840                 iGreen = (int) (fGreen * 0xFF);
00841                 if (iGreen == 0) {
00842                         strcat(buffer, "00");
00843                 } else {
00844                         sGreen = itoa(iGreen, hexString, 16);
00845                         strcat(buffer, sGreen);
00846                 }
00847 
00848                 char* sRed = "";

00850                 float fRed = red < 0 ? 1 : (red > 1 ? 1 : red);
00851                 iRed = (int) (fRed * 0xFF);
00852                 if (iRed == 0) {
00853                         strcat(buffer, "00");
00854                 } else {
00855                         sRed=itoa(iRed,hexString,16);
00856                         strcat(buffer, sRed);

00886 
00896         static vector<float> rgbToHSV(float r, float g, float b, vector<float> hsv)
00897         { 
00898                 float h = 0, s = 0;
00899                 float v = (r > g) ? ((r > b) ? r : b) : ((g > b) ? g : b);
00900                 float d = v - (r < g) ? ((r < b) ? r : b) : ((g < b) ? g : b);
00901 
00902                 if (v != 0.0) {
00903                         s = d / v;
00904                 }
00905                 if (s != 0.0) {
00906                         if (fabs(r - v) < 0.0000001) {
00907                                 h = (g - b) / d;
00908                         } else if (fabs(g - v) < 0.0000001) {
00909                                 h = 2 + (b - r) / d;
00910                         } else {
00911                                 h = 4 + (r - g) / d;
00912                         }
00913                 }
00914 
00915                 h *= INV60DEGREES;
00916 
00917                 if (h < 0) {
00918                         h += 1.0f;
00919                 }
00920 
00921                 hsv[0] = h;
00922                 hsv[1] = s;
00923                 hsv[2] = v;
00924                 return hsv;
00925         }
00926 
00936         static vector<float> bgrToHSV(float b, float g, float r, vector<float> _hsv)
00937         {
00938                 return rgbToHSV(r, g, b, _hsv);
00939         }
00940         
00949         static OColor newHSV(Hue hue, float s, float v) {
00950                 return newHSVA(hue.getHue(), s, v, 1.0);
00951         }
